meanings.definition: To save from danger or harm.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter was rescuing the kitten from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys rescuing injured animals and helping them recover.
meanings.sent3: The superhero was busy rescuing all the lost socks in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words were like rescuing a drowning person in a sea of despair.
meanings.sent5: The lifeguard was rescuing the struggling swimmer from the strong currents.

meanings.definition: The act of saving someone or something from a dangerous or harmful situation.
meanings.sent1: The rescuing of the hikers trapped on the mountain was a success.
meanings.sent2: He received an award for his brave rescuing of the injured bird.
meanings.sent3: The rescuing of the lost balloon from the tree was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a rescuing light in the darkness of the room.
meanings.sent5: The rescuing of the old books from the flood brought joy to the librarian.
